      生成随机向量,默认大小为cipher.getBlockSize(), 16字节.

      signature = hmac(integrityKey, payload || initVector)
      static byte[] initPlainData(int payloadSize, byte[] initVector)
      Packages plaintext payload for encryption; returns initVector || payload || zeros:4.
      private static void xorPayloadToHmacPad(byte[] workBytes, String ekey)
      payload = payload ^ hmac(encryptionKey, initVector || counterBytes) per max-20-byte blocks.

        isUrlSafe - 价格是否使用base64UrlSafe进行编码
